ModMetaData.name: 活铁网 Living Wire
ModMetaData.author: 283k
ModMetaData.description:
Added an advanced entity inspired by Pax Britannica(a mod of Hearts of Iron IV).

-Passive periodic area damage, a troublesome debuff effect with a probability, causing high damage to buildings.

-Defeat it to unlock the surgery to remove this debuff and a special trap.
